languages.text: "Сомнение в себе лишило нас сил и заставило медлить, как медлили оставившие нам свои заветы старцы. От страха перед переменами мы впали в догматизм, были парализованы и расхищали драгоценные мгновения, в которые могли переменить судьбу. Тогда мы распались, беспомощно убегая от дилеммы. И, разобщенные, мы открыли свои слабости миру".

"Self-doubt drained our strength and made us hesitate, just as the elders, whose testaments we were following, hesitated. Our fear of change drove us to dogma, paralysed us, and made us waste precious moments when we could have altered destiny's course. We fell apart, helplessly fleeing the dilemma. And in scattering we exposed our weakness to the world."
languages.original_text: "Сомнение в себе лишило нас сил и заставило медлить, как медлили оставившие нам свои заветы старцы. От страха перед переменами мы впали в догматизм, были парализованы и расхищали драгоценные мгновения, в которые могли переменить судьбу. Тогда мы распались, беспомощно убегая от дилеммы. И, разобщенные, мы открыли свои слабости миру".

traits.locale_text: "Self-doubt drained our strength and made us hesitate, just as the elders, whose testaments we were following, had hesitated. Our fear of change drove us to dogma, paralysed us, and made us waste the precious moments when we could have altered destiny's course. It was then that we fell apart as we ran helplessly from the dilemma. And our scattering exposed our weaknesses for the world to see."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「自信を失った我々は力を失い、己を恥じた。まさに、己の遺言にしたがっていた老人が恥じるがごとく。変化を恐れた我々は教義に駆り立てられ、麻痺し、運命の舵取りを変えられたはずが、貴重なその瞬間を無駄にした。我々は瓦解し、何もできず葛藤から逃げ出した。そしてこの世のあちこちで弱さをさらけ出したのだ」
languages.original_text: "Self-doubt drained our strength and made us hesitate, just as the elders, whose testaments we were following, hesitated. Our fear of change drove us to dogma, paralysed us, and made us waste precious moments when we could have altered destiny's course. We fell apart, helplessly fleeing the dilemma. And in scattering we exposed our weakness to the world."

traits.locale_text: 「自信を失った我々は力を失い、己を恥じた。まさに、己の遺言にしたがっていた老人が恥じるがごとく。変化を恐れた我々は教義に駆り立てられ、麻痺し、運命の舵取りを変えられたはずが、貴重なその瞬間を無駄にした。我々は瓦解し、何もできず葛藤から逃げ出した。そしてこの世のあちこちで弱さをさらけ出したのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “自我怀疑耗尽了我们的力量，使我们踌躇不前，正如我们的先人与我们所遵循的那些遗训一样。出于对改变的恐惧，我们故步自封、逐步瘫痪，我们浪费了本可以改变命运的宝贵时间。我们崩溃了，无助地逃离这个困境，向世界暴露了我们的软弱。”
languages.original_text: "Self-doubt drained our strength and made us hesitate, just as the elders, whose testaments we were following, hesitated. Our fear of change drove us to dogma, paralysed us, and made us waste precious moments when we could have altered destiny's course. We fell apart, helplessly fleeing the dilemma. And in scattering we exposed our weakness to the world."

traits.locale_text: “自我怀疑耗尽了我们的力量，使我们踌躇不前，正如我们的显然与我们所遵循的那些遗训一样。出于对改变的恐惧，我们故步自封、逐步瘫痪，我们浪费了本可以改变命运的宝贵时间。我们崩溃了，无助地逃离这个困境，向世界暴露了我们的软弱。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le doute nous a vidés de nos forces et nous a fait hésiter, de la même manière que nos ancêtres dont nous suivions les testaments. Nous avions tellement peur du changement que nous nous sommes enfermés dans un dogme qui nous a paralysés et nous a empêchés d'agir au moment où nous aurions pu altérer notre destinée. Pour fuir le dilemme, nous nous sommes désagrégés, et ce faisant, nous avons avoué notre faiblesse à l'univers tout entier. »
languages.original_text: "Self-doubt drained our strength and made us hesitate, just as the elders, whose testaments we were following, hesitated. Our fear of change drove us to dogma, paralysed us, and made us waste precious moments when we could have altered destiny's course. We fell apart, helplessly fleeing the dilemma. And in scattering we exposed our weakness to the world."

traits.locale_text: « Le doute nous a vidés de nos forces et nous a fait hésiter, de la même manière que nos ancêtres dont nous suivions les testaments. Nous avions tellement peur du changement que nous nous sommes enfermés dans un dogme qui nous a paralysés et nous a empêchés d'agir au moment où nous aurions pu altérer notre destinée. Pour fuir le dilemme, nous nous sommes désagrégés, et ce faisant, nous avons avoué notre faiblesse à l'univers tout entier. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La baja autoestima drenó nuestra fuerza y nos hizo dudar, como les ocurrió a nuestros predecesores, cuyos preceptos seguíamos. Nuestro miedo al cambio nos llevó a seguir el dogma, nos paralizó y nos hizo malgastar momentos fundamentales en los que podíamos haber cambiado el curso del destino. Nos desmoronamos, huyendo sin poder resolver el dilema. Y al dispersarnos, expusimos nuestra debilidad al mundo».
languages.original_text: "Self-doubt drained our strength and made us hesitate, just as the elders, whose testaments we were following, hesitated. Our fear of change drove us to dogma, paralysed us, and made us waste precious moments when we could have altered destiny's course. We fell apart, helplessly fleeing the dilemma. And in scattering we exposed our weakness to the world."

traits.locale_text: «La baja autoestima drenó nuestra fuerza y nos hizo dudar, como les ocurrió a nuestros predecesores, cuyos preceptos seguíamos. Nuestro miedo al cambio nos llevó a seguir el dogma, nos paralizó y nos hizo malgastar momentos fundamentales en los que podíamos haber cambiado el curso del destino. Nos desmoronamos, huyendo sin poder resolver el dilema. Y al dispersarnos, expusimos nuestra debilidad al mundo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Selbstzweifel haben uns unsere Kraft gekostet und uns zögern lassen, genau wie die Älteren zögerten, deren Testamente wir befolgten. Unsere Angst vor dem Wandel hat uns ins Dogma getrieben, uns gelähmt, uns wertvolle Augenblicke vergeuden lassen, wo wir den Lauf des Schicksals hätten verändern können. Wir sind zerfallen, hilflos vor dem Dilemma geflohen. Und indem wir uns zerstreut haben, haben wir der Welt unsere Schwäche offenbart."
languages.original_text: "Self-doubt drained our strength and made us hesitate, just as the elders, whose testaments we were following, hesitated. Our fear of change drove us to dogma, paralysed us, and made us waste precious moments when we could have altered destiny's course. We fell apart, helplessly fleeing the dilemma. And in scattering we exposed our weakness to the world."

traits.locale_text: "Selbstzweifel haben uns unsere Kraft gekostet und uns zögern lassen, genau wie die Älteren zögerten, deren Testamente wir befolgten. Unsere Angst vor dem Wandel hat uns ins Dogma getrieben, uns gelähmt, uns wertvolle Augenblicke vergeuden lassen, wo wir den Lauf des Schicksals hätten verändern können. Wir sind zerfallen, hilflos vor dem Dilemma geflohen. Und indem wir uns zerstreut haben, haben wir der Welt unsere Schwäche offenbart."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Kendimizden şüphe etmek, gücümüzü emdi. Ttıpkı ahitlerini takip ettiğimiz yaşlılar gibi tereddütte kaldık. Değişime dair korkumuz bizi dogmaya itti, paralize etti ve kaderin gidişatını etkileyebileceğimiz değerli zamanımızı boşa harcamamıza neden oldu. Parçalandık ve çaresizce ikilemden kaçtık. Dağılarak zayıflığımızı dünyaya açık ettik."
languages.original_text: "Self-doubt drained our strength and made us hesitate, just as the elders, whose testaments we were following, hesitated. Our fear of change drove us to dogma, paralysed us, and made us waste precious moments when we could have altered destiny's course. We fell apart, helplessly fleeing the dilemma. And in scattering we exposed our weakness to the world."

traits.locale_text: "Kendimizden şüpheye düşmek gücümüzü emdi ve tereddütte kaldık, tıpkı ahitlerini takip ettiğimiz yaşlıların tereddütte kaldığı gibi. Değişime dair korkumuz bizi dogmaya itti, bizi paralize etti ve kaderin gidişatını etkileyebileceğimiz değerli zamanımızı boşa harcamamıza neden oldu. Parçalandık ve çaresizce ikilemden kaçtık. Ve dağılarak zayıflığımızı dünyaya açık ettik."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
